resonance.name: Shattering Ice
resonance.description: Affected by Electro for 40% less time. Increases CRIT Rate against enemies that are Frozen or affected by Cryo by 15%

reactions.name: Superconduct
reactions.description: Deals AoE Cryo damage and reduces the Physical resistance of enemies caught in the AoE by 40%

reactions.name: Melt
reactions.description: Deals x1.5 Cryo damage to enemies affected by Pyro
